metadata.title: CVE-2024-21061 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Audit Plug-in).  Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.35and prior and  8.2.0 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerability allowshigh privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols tocompromise MySQL Server.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatablecrash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availabilityimpacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

criterions.comment: mysql-8.0 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mariadb-10.3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
